tweet: Dennis and Akiko Tito are the first two crewmembers on Starship's second commercial spaceflight around the Moon.

author: Elon Musk
tweet: We might need a different name, as this is a basically just Starlink with roaming capacity, so you can take your terminal anywhere.
content: Starlink for RVs noe has over 100,000 customers! Access high-speed, low-latency internet on an as needed basis anywhere Starlink provides active coverage.
